duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage Systems Engineering Managers to support Systems Engineers in generating growth within Major Accounts.
Partner with the Regional Vice President of Sales to drive enterprise-wide sales-related initiatives within Major Accounts.
Oversee technical pre-sales operations and achieve revenue generation, individual, team, and organizational quotas.
Interact at a senior level with customers and partners and provide valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, technical evolutions, and business changes.
Develop outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives that drive pipeline and sales within the Area.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with Palo Alto Networks’ partners and drive initiatives to improve sales productivity through partner leverage.
Ensure the teams develop deep ongoing relationships across their accounts to drive adoption and growth across the portfolio after the initial sale.
Report and make visible the successes and deficiencies of the initiatives within your area.
Provide account support through SE assignments, load balancing, continuity, strategic planning with Sales management, Sales Reps, and SEs.
Operate effectively in a matrix manner with extended teams, such as Support, Finance, WW SE, HR, Product Management, and other relevant organizations.
Manage successful evaluations and timely return of evaluation equipment.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line Systems Engineering management experience. Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred).
